vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Ἑμμώρ (T, Ἐμμώρ, Rec. -όρ indecl. (Heb. חֲמוֹר),
Emmor (Gen.33:19): Act.7:16.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.33.19;
father of: Shechem (H7927H)
§ Hamor, "male donkey"
also spelled Ἑμμόρ, Hamor, (Proper name), indeclinable, Acts 7:16
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
哈抹 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "驢子"
示劍的父親 #徒 7:16|
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
哈抹 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "驴子"
示剑的父亲 #徒 7:16|
